org.akubraproject.tck
Class AbstractTests

java.lang.Object
  org.akubraproject.tck.AbstractTests
Direct Known Subclasses:
TCKTestSuite
public abstract class AbstractTests
extends Object

A set of helpers for the TCK tests. Most of these helpers are not static even though they could be so that they can overriden if necessary.

Author:
Ronald Tschal√§r
